source.eed2f88e:
avg_sati_top5 = grouped_rk.satisfaction[:5].mean()
avg_sati_top50 = grouped_rk.satisfaction.mean()
print(f'The average satisfaction of the top 5 jobs is {avg_sati_top5}')
print(f'The average satisfaction of the top 50 jobs is {avg_sati_top50}')
